data.actual_result: The create/join pop-up buttons display and the original pop-up is hidden.
data.expected_result: The initial pop-up should appear and the create/join server one should not show.
data.short_description: When clicking any icon that results in a pop-up, if you tap create server quick enough, it comes up instead.
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap 3 lines in top left so you are viewing servers/channels/small piece of chat from left to right - Tap any icon that results in a pop-up (Server name, invite members, online status, search, recent mentions, user settings) - Immediately tap the create/join server button - Observe how the initial pop-up begins to display, but then the create/join server pop-up is displayed instead
